title: Overall
stimulusHtml:

atque honore: and honor/prestige/distinction

plebes

debt

injustice of the (more/very) powerful

accusative

dative

Subquestion 6 (1 point):

freedman/freedwoman/freedperson

free man/free woman/free person

libertus/a (libertinus/a, liberatus/a)

a client (cliens) of his/her former master

called by his/her former master’s name

Roman citizen
